title: A Dragon That My Cat Brought Home - Novel Updates
tags: Dragons   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Pets
author: 단향목
description:
On one rainy day, my cat came back home carrying a newborn kitten.
I thought it was a kitten, but now I don’t think it was a kitten.
How do I raise a baby dragon?
A diary of the life of a cat with a full-fledged dragon.>
